mushtiThreshold: The max wrist-to-tip distance ratio for a curled finger. Lower means more curled.
requiredCurled: How many fingers (including thumb) must be curled to count as Mushti.
fingerRatio: Finger ratio = distance(wrist->tip) / distance(wrist->MCP). Below threshold means curled.
thumbRatio: Thumb curl = distance(thumb tip -> any finger MCP). Below threshold means curled.
motionWindow: Time window (ms) used to measure net wrist movement.
samples: How many recent frames are in the motion buffer vs the minimum needed.
displacement: Net wrist Y movement over the window. Down = steadiness, up = courage.
motionThreshold: Minimum displacement to trigger an action label.
graceWindow: Grace period (ms) after Mushti is achieved to classify the first move.
upwardThreshold: Minimum upward wrist movement during grace window to trigger Courage.
downwardThreshold: Minimum downward wrist movement during grace window to trigger Steadiness.
pitchUpThreshold: Minimum wrist-to-finger MCP Z delta (toward camera) to count as a pitch-up rotation.
